description:
Please contact Dr. Steven Wilhelm (wilhelm@utk.edu) for additional information regarding this protocol.

 

 

Modified from: Watanabe, Makoto M. "Fresh-and salt-water forms of Spirulina platensis in axenic cultures." Bull. Jpn. Soc. Phycol. 25 (1977): 371-377.

groups.group_name: The Aquatic Microbial Ecology Research Group - AMERG (The Buchan, Zinser and Wilhelm labs)

components.data: Add 20 g/100 mL TAPS in an acid-washed bottle
components.name: Description

components.data: Add 10 g/100 mL KNO3 in an acid-washed bottle
components.name: Description

components.data: Filter sterilize. Aliquot into 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes and store and -20ºC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize. Aliquot into 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes and store and -20ºC.

components.data: Filter sterilize. It may be helpful to dispense into 50 mL Falcon tubes. Store at 4ºC.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Filter sterilize. It may be helpful to dispense into 50 mL Falcon tubes. Store at 4ºC.

components.data: Add 990 mL Milli-Q H2O to an acid-washed bottle

components.data: Add 1 mL vitamin stock solution after media cools
